releaseNotes: New update, same good vibes. We kicked bugs out of the party and made the app run smoother than ever. Update now and see for yourself!
description:
Where fun-ever-after begins

Smitten is the dating app for singles who want something real without the pressure. Whether you're fresh out of a relationship or just tired of boring bios and dead-end chats, we've got you. Smitten helps you find your kind of people—with games, personality reveals, and conversation starters built right in.
Tired of dating apps that feel like job interviews?
Smitten makes dating less awkward and way more fun. We’ve built a space where personality actually matters, the pressure’s off, and conversation flows from the start. Whether you're looking for love, friendship, or just vibing with someone new — this is your sign to make dating fun again.

Here’s what makes Smitten different:
- Profiles that actually say something
Fun prompts, personality quizzes, and interactive features show you who people really are — not just their best angle.

- Guessary: break the ice, playfully
Our signature guessing game turns awkward intros into laughs. Because “what’s your biggest beige flag?” says way more than “hey.”

- DUO mode: double dating, redefined
Team up with a friend and match with other duos. It’s like a social experiment, but with drinks and double the fun.

- Search by vibe, not just looks
Find people who want what you want — from long-term love to spontaneous hangs — plus shared interests, values, and more.

Conversations that start themselves
- We help you skip the awkward small talk with built-in features that give you something real to connect over.

- Not sure about someone? Like them later
A feature where you can choose to ‘like later’ rather than now without nope-ing them, sending them into the abyss and never seeing them again. Maybe you are just not feeling it now but might later. 

We won't promise you'll meet "the one" today—but we'll make it a lot more fun to try. Just remember: the better your profile, the better your odds. 

Smitten is for people who:
- Want to know someone before the chat even starts
- Are over swipe-fatigue and shallow small talk
- Don’t mind having a little fun while meeting someone new
- Believe dating should feel good, not like a chore

Still reading?Just try it.
Honestly, what’s the worst that could happen? You might meet someone cute. Or laugh. Or both.

——
The app is free to use. Users looking to access optional features can subscribe to our premium membership.
Terms apply: https://www.websitepolicies.com/policies/view/d4cOtUMF
